channel.title: Factory on L
channel.description: Recent content in Factory on L

item.title: 23 Design Patterns
item.description: By Yuliang, lu Singleton Definition Ensure a class has only one instance and provide a global point of access to it. Code Factory Definition: Define an interface for creating an object, but let subclasses decide which class to initiate. Factory Method lets a class defer instantiation to subclasses.
